Description.Name: Burke II
Description.Details: Superheavy version of the Burke tank created for the Rim Worlds Republic army during their occupation of Terra in 2776-2777. Only pair of Prototypes were produced before the vehicle's production line was destroyed by SLDF forces. The Burke was created as a static defense vehicle for the Star League Defense Force in 2580. The tank is noteworthy for its devastating long-range firepower. Due to its ponderous speed and lack of short ranged weaponry, SLDF frontline forces disliked the vehicle, though garrison forces highly prized it. Leopard Armor was destroyed in 2778 during the Star League Civil War. This cut off parts and support for the Burkes with the militaries of the Great Houses. Without support for the surviving tanks, the model disappeared from the armies of the Successor States by the end of the multiple century conflict. Only in secret did ComStar's ComGuard units maintain a number of these vehicles in operational condition within the Inner Sphere. The Clans, whom themselves are descendants of SLDF also maintained a number of them as well, particularly Clan Hell's Horses. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 2/3 Hex: 60/90 Meters. Armor: Ferro-Fibrous Structure: Structure Values A S Front 110 98 Left 70 98 Right 70 98 Rear 48 98 Turret 95 98 Total 393 490

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
